title: In search of...Eddie Plank...a long shot.
author: iowadoc77

posts.post_title: In search of...Eddie Plank...a long shot.
posts.post_content:
T206 Eddie Plank
Yes, I know this is a long shot
Yes, I know about what they go for
I just acquired a Magie and this is the next big step toward completing my 522 card Monster
Let me know if anyone has one available. It will have to be a lower grade example and I would possibly be open to an A grade depending on the reason for A designation. Thanks for looking and for contacting me if you have one
Eric
Good luck with the Plank!! Were you the one who snagged the Magie (Authentic) a couple weeks ago on ebay?

[quote name="ronniehatesjazz" post=1662810]Good luck with the Plank!! Were you the one who snagged the Magie (Authentic) a couple weeks ago on ebay?[/QUOTE]

I actually made a very fair deal with another member of this forum. Glad to have that card. Now onward and upward as they say.

Anyone have one they would part with or know of someone who does?
Thanks in advance!
In search of Plank, Eddie please.
Would love to talk if anyone has one. Even if it is not now but maybe in the future.
There's a PSA 3 listed with Hunt Auctions. I'm close to searching for a Plank also but will probably grab a Magie first.
Thanks Ron. I have seen that one. I picked up my Magie a few months ago so hoping Plank can be next.
1 week bumparoosky. Not sure on spelling there...  any help or leads would be appreciated and we can certainly discuss a nice finders fee for any kind soul that helps in the pursuit. Thanks!
